name: RpnGraphCalculator
tagline: Stanford CS193P Assignment 2 & 3 - Programmable RPN Graphing Calculator
body:
### Welcome to my implementation of Stanford CS193P Assignment 2 & 3.

The screenshots below show some of the functionalities implemented:
- No functionality was removed when moving forward to the next assignments, so the application is still using 2 variables for the programable part (called x and y). The graphing part only uses the x variable though.
- Demonstrate how to use a pop-over for the master view of the SplitViewController on the iPad.
- Additionally, the calculator looks neat! ;-)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
